RelatedSentence: No fewer than  20 people escaped death with varying degree of injury yesterday , when they were trapped inside a church building that collapsed in Agudama - Epie , Yenagoa , the  Bayelsa State capital during a heavy rain storm .
According to  eye - witness account , many people had ran into the uncompleted building housing the National Apostolic Church of Nigeria , for cover when the rainstorm started .
Apparently anxious to avoid being soaked by the rain , they did not notice that the pillars holding the building were mounted with bricks and wooden panels .

A1: a church building that collapsed in Agudama-Epie , Yenagoa , the Bayelsa State capital during a heavy rain storm
RelatedSentence: Apparently anxious to avoid being soaked by the rain , they did not notice that the pillars holding the building were mounted with bricks and wooden panels .
They were said to have heard a thunderous sound , which they thought  was thunder and when it dawned on them that  the sound was from the building signalling its collapse , it was too late .
